[LIST_ITEM] Glands outside - Salivary glands, Liver, Pancreas
[NUMBERED_ITEM] Lining Mucosa: lip, cheek, floor of mouth, soft palate, ventral surface of tongue Epithelium - non-keratinized Submucosa contains salivary glands
[NUMBERED_ITEM] Masticatory Mucosa: gingiva, hard palate Epithelium - keratinized or parakeratinized Submucosa - absent
[NUMBERED_ITEM] Specialized Mucosa: dorsal surface of tongue
[NUMBERED_ITEM] Circumvallate Papillae – non-keratinized epithelium with associated taste buds and von Ebner’s salivary glands
Michigan Medical School Histology Slide Collection
Oral mucosa: St. sq. non-keratinized epithelium Labial salivary glands in submucosa
Vermillion border (zone) Dilated venules and veins lacks salivary glands
Skin: Hair follicles sebaceous glands sweat glands
